output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post against the provided criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present in the post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly refers to Elena Lasconi (USR presidential candidate) by surname.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - High impression count (100,000-124,999) - Large estimated audience size (>1,000,001) - Significant spend (200-299 RON)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - The content aims to discredit a presidential candidate's foreign policy stance - Presents the candidate in a mocking, simplistic way - Timing during election period - Format and presentation suggests intention to influence voters
5. Journalism: No - This is not presenting balanced journalistic content - While it quotes Cristoiu, it's selective and used for electoral impact - Lacks context and balanced reporting
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a paid, targeted campaign - Organized distribution through paid channels - Professional page running political content

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Directly targets a presidential candidate - Uses paid distribution channels - Has clear electoral objective to influence voters - Timing during sensitive electoral period - Large scale distribution - Not journalistic or personal opinion content
conclusion.message-for-police: 60m.RO, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook si Instagram (ID: 2320121051682166) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu continut de propaganda electorala negativa la adresa candidatei Elena Lasconi. Postarea a avut un impact semnificativ, ajungand la peste 100.000 de afisari, fiind platita cu 200-299 RON. Continutul prezinta in mod denigrator pozitia candidatei pe politica externa, cu scopul clar de a influenta alegatorii in perioada de interdictie a propagandei electorale.
